message: Hi Bob, let's start with this offer. I get 7000 and you get 3000.  It's a good deal for you considering the money will be worth less with each round!
I think we should meet somewhere in the middle. Considering the inflation, I believe this is a fair offer.

Hi Bob, let's try this again. I understand the inflation is affecting your gains, but my offer is still the fairest.  I'll take a small cut to 6500, leaving you with 3500.  It's better to agree now than lose more value in another round!
Considering I've already lost 36% of the value, I think it's only fair that I get a larger share of the original amount. This is my counteroffer.
Bob, this is my final offer. I'm taking a significant cut to end this negotiation. I get 6000, you get 4000.  The value for you will only decrease from here. Let's be reasonable and wrap this up.
